name: Ambient Rings
tag_list: iphone, ringtone, enterprise, business, discreet, ipad, notification, tones, notifications, ringers
overview:
Ambient Rings is a company that engineers professional ringtones for Apple’s iPhone. Launched in 2009, Ambient Rings caters to professionals, students, and anyone who prefers discreet, nondescript, and professional-grade ringtones for their iPhone.

Ambient Rings’ ringtones are designed specifically for the iPhone; they are loud enough to hear in crowded public settings without damaging your iPhone’s speaker. With continued success, Ambient Rings is poised to become the industry leader in discreet ringtones for Apple’s iPhone.

Ambient Rings released multiple beta ringtone packs to its over 900 beta testers during the latter half of 2010. It also maintained a free preview ringtone pack, downloaded over 25 000 times between late 2010 and early 2011. The company launched its 100-ringtone library in May 2011 for $2.99USD.

In summer 2011, Ambient Rings plans to submit a preview application to the App Store to complement its HTML5 web app, currently featured in the OpenAppMkt.

Currently, Ambient Rings supports both iPhone and iPad, providing a mix of enterprise-quality ringtones and notification tones, serving a worldwide customer base.

milestones.description: As of December 11, 2010, Ambient Rings' preview ringtone pack has been distributed over 25, 000 times.
Ambient Rings officially launches with a 100-ringtone pack for $1.99 USD.
Ambient Rings announces it will produce business-friendly SMS tones for iPhone following the release of iOS 5.
milestones.source_description: Custom iPhone SMS tones in iOS 5

milestones.description: Ambient Rings partners with Daillly, a virtual goods bulk discount site, to sell its 100 ringtone library for discounted price of $1.00 USD.
Ambient Rings supports iPad with notification tones.
